731588f-a.title: Feast of the Crucifix.
731588f-a.text:
Feast of the Crucifix, 1929, No. 1. Showing an altar erected in
front of No. 128 Chrystie Street.
September 9, 1927.
P. L. Sperr.
NEG# 3436

718826f-a.text:

July 12, 1930.

2. The same, south from but not include Broome Street.
July 12, 1930.
P.L. Sperr.

718827f-a.text:
